remote_past: i; two days before or earlier
recent_past: i; on day before the present
immediate_past: i; the same day but earlier

recent_past: i; less than a few days

remote_past: i; emphasizes the historicness of the act
immediate_past: u; indicates a recent past or a present

recent_past: i;recent past previous day or a few months ago (this is the norm but it is relative to the total situation, and sometimes an event of only a few weeks ago will be expressed with the distant past suffix)
immediate_past: i;immediate past same day or previous night

remote_past: i; remote past a long time ago

recent_past: i; several hours to several years ago

remote_past: i; long time ago remote past
